metadata.title: CVE-2023-29450 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: JavaScript pre-processing can be used by the attacker to gain access to the file system (read-only access on behalf of user "zabbix") on the Zabbix Server or Zabbix Proxy, potentially leading to unauthorized access to sensitive data.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
